name: Iron
description: Iron is an essential mineral that plays a critical role in the production of hemoglobin, which carries oxygen to the body's tissues. It helps to fortify the blood and prevent anemia. Iron also supports immune function and cognitive health. With Iron, you can boost your energy levels and stay healthy. Iron is suitable for both men and women.
